alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 2:57PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts up to 30 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to midnight MDT Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
